  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public boolean createUser(String username)
      Creates a new user account and persists it to disk.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to create (must not be null, empty, or 'admin')
      Returns:
      true if user was created, false if user exists or invalid

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(String username)
      Deletes a user account and removes its data file.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to delete (must not be null, empty, 'admin', or 'stock')
      Returns:
      true if user was deleted, false if not found or invalid

    • listUsers

      public List<String> listUsers()
      Lists all usernames managed by the admin.
      Returns:
      a copy of the usernames list

    • userExists

      public boolean userExists(String username)
      Checks if a user exists by username (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check
      Returns:
      true if user exists, false otherwise
